userInfo.name: Ibrahim
userInfo.title: Software Engineer
userInfo.introduction: Software Engineer with more than 4 years of experience. Have a strong interest in all aspects of software engineering. Combine's solution-oriented working with excellent communication. Always curious to new things and currently exploring technologies such as AWS, Astro.js, Web Components. Have experience variety of JavaScript frameworks such as Vue.js, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Vite.js, React/React-Native, Typescript and also Node.js.
